code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Container,Segment,Header,Message,Card,Icon}from'semantic-ui-react';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import{backApi}from'../misc/BackApi';import{handleLogError}from'../misc/Helpers';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserBankCard=()=>{const{getUser}=useAuth();const[bankCard,setBankCard]=useState(null);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const fetchBankCard=async()=>{try{const user=getUser();const response=await backApi.getBankCardForCurrentUser(user);setBankCard(response.data);}catch(error){handleLogError(error);setError(error.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchBankCard();},[getUser]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Message,{children:"Loading..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Message,{negative:true,children:["Error: ",error]});if(!bankCard)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Message,{children:"No bank card found."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Segment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{as:"h3",children:"Your Bank Card"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{centered:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Content,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{name:"credit card",size:"large"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Header,{children:bankCard.cardHolderName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Meta,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"date",children:["Expires ",bankCard.expiryDate]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Description,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Card Number:"})," ",bankCard.cardNumber]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"CVV:"})," ",bankCard.cvv]})]})]})})]})});};export default UserBankCard;
